title: Rikers Island Prison Complex
title_page: Rikers Island Prison Complex - The New York Times
maintext:
Man Held at Rikers Dies From Razor Wound After Guards Fail to Intervene
A captain and two correction officers were suspended last week after failing to help a man for 10 minutes after he slit his throat. He was taken off life support on Tuesday.
